participant_1.background:
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking!
My favorite people are my friends who I can drink coffee with and talk about anything.
My longest relationship was with my dog Collie, but he passed away a few years ago.
i work at a daycare.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.

My time is my most valuable possession.
i have a hard time feeling connected with people.

i make and me by waiting tables.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.

content.text: I'm doing great! How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm in school right now, but I'm really enjoying it.
That's awesome! What are you studying?
I'm studying psychology. I want to be a therapist one day.
That's a great goal! I hope you achieve it.
What's your favorite thing about psychology?
I love learning about how the mind works. I also love helping people.
That's really cool! I'm glad you have a passion for helping others.
Thank you! I think it's important to help people in need.
I agree! What's your favorite thing to do outside of school?
I love spending time with my friends and family. I also love reading and watching movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love reading too.
I have a lot of favorite books, but one of my favorites is "The Great Gatsby."
That's a great book! I love the story and the characters.
Me too! It's one of those books that you can read over and over again and still find new things to appreciate.
I agree! It's a classic for a reason
